casebody.data:
No. 75957 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 10, 2018

Theresa Mary AUSTIN, as Trustee of the Theresa Mary Autsin Living Trust Dated May 4, 2000; Kelly Goodman; Danny Prater; Lisa-Helen Strasser; Lyle Damon and Karen D. Damon as Trustees, or the Successor Trustee, of the Lyle Damon and Karen D. Damon Trust Under Trust Agreement Dated April 26, 2013, Appellants,
v.
SUN MESA, LLC; and Landmark Homes and Development, Inc., Respondents.

Dismissed.
